name: Busy Traffic Street - A Endless Rush Hour Crossy Road Game
name_original: Busy Traffic Street - A Endless Rush Hour Crossy Road Game
description:
Busy Traffic Street - A Endless Rush Hour Crossy Road Game, score points by letting vehicles cross the intersection and tap on a human make him run. Tap on a vehicle to stop it and swipe across it to accelerate. Remember! Try to avoid human casualties.

Features:

- True Full Version and no IAP

- Fun and Addictive game

- Very easy to play

- Endless Levels

Get it Now!!!
